Game: Base
ScoringTiles: SCORE9, SCORE3, SCORE8, SCORE5, SCORE6, SCORE4
BonusCards: BON-SPD, BON-4C, BON-6C, BON-BB, BON-P, BON-DW, BON-SHIP-VP
StartingVPs: Engineers:20, Darklings:20, Cultists:20, Witches:20

Setup
TurnOrder: Engineers, Darklings, Cultists, Witches
------------------------------------------------------------
Engineers    | Darklings    | Cultists     | Witches     
------------------------------------------------------------
S-E7         | S-G5         | S-E6         | S-F4        
S-H6         | S-E5         | S-F5         | S-E9        
BON-6C       | BON-P        | BON-BB       | BON-SPD
